إذا كانت لديك أية أسئلة أو اقتراحات بخصو: If you have any questions or suggestions, please send us through the following form

رقم الجوال يجب أن يكون لا يكون أكبر من 1: The phone number must be less than 10 digits
رقم الهوية يجب أن يكون لا يكون أكبر من 1: The ID number must be equal 10 digits
سيتم اشعارك بحالة الطلب عبر البريد الإلك: You will be notified about the status of your request via email
رقم الحساب البنكي للجمعية لدي بنك البلاد: Bank account number of the organization
الرجاء ادخال اسم المنشأة: Please enter the name of the organization
الرجاء ادخال اسم المنسق: Please enter the name of the coordinator
جميع الحقوق محفوظة لجمعية سفراء التراث: All rights reserved to HERITAGE AMBASSADORS ASSOCIATION
العمر يجب ان يكون اكبر من 18: The age must be greater than 18
رقم الهوية يجب أن يكون لا يكون أقل من 10: The ID number must be less than 10 digits

إذا كانت لديك أية أسئلة أو اقتراحات الر: If you have any questions or suggestions, please send us through the following form
يكون العضو منتسبًا في الجمعية إذا تقدم ب: A member is affiliated with the association if he submits an application for membership to the association and it appears that one of the working membership conditions does not apply to him, and a decision was issued by the board of directors to accept him as an associate member, or if he submitted an associate membership application.
دفع اشتراك سنوي في الجمعية مقداره (800): Pay an annual subscription to the association in the amount of (800) riyals.
التعاون مع الجمعية ومنسوبيها لتحقيق أهدا: Cooperating with the association and its employees to achieve its goals.
عدم القيام بأي أمر من شأنه أن يلحق ضرراً: Not to do anything that might harm the association.
Adherence to the decisions of the General Assembly.
Participation in the activities of the association.
تلقي المعلومات الأساسية عن نشاطات الجمعي: Receiving basic information on the association's activities periodically every financial year.
Examine the documents of the association and its documents.
للعضو المنتسب مخاطبة الجمعية عبر أي وسيل: An affiliated member may address the association through any available means, and the board of directors or whomever it authorizes must provide the answer through the same means or through his address registered in the membership register.
يكون عضوًا شرفيًا في الجمعية من ترى الجم: An honorary member of the association shall be whoever the general assembly deems to be granted an honorary membership in the board of directors in return for his distinction in the association's field of work.
يجوز لمجلس الإدارة دعوة العضو الشرفي في: The Board of Directors may invite the honorary member to the meetings of the Board without having the right to vote.
لا يحق للعضو الشرفي طلب حضور الجمعية الع: The honorary member is not entitled to request to attend the general assembly or to nominate himself for membership in the board of directors, and his attendance does not prove the validity of the board of directors meeting
للعضو الشرفي مخاطبة الجمعية عبر أي وسيلة: The honorary member may address the association through any available means, and the board of directors or whomever it authorizes must provide the answer through the same means or through his address registered in the membership register.
يكون العضو عاملاً في الجمعية إذا اشترك ف: A member is a worker in the association if he participated in the establishment of the association, or joined it after its establishment and the board of directors accepted his membership, and he was a specialist, interested or practicing the specialty of the association.
دفع اشتراك سنوي في الجمعية مقداره (1000): Pay an annual subscription to the association in the amount of (1000) riyals.
الاطلاع على مستندات الجمعية ووثائقها ومن: Examining the association’s documents and papers, including the resolutions issued in the association, whether they are from the general assembly, the board of directors, the executive director, or others.
الاطلاع على الميزانية العمومية للجمعية و: Examine the general budget of the association and its attachments at the association's headquarters and before presenting it to the general assembly in sufficient time.
التصويت على قرارات الجمعية العمومية إذا: Vote on the decisions of the General Assembly if he has spent six months from the date of joining the Assembly.
تلقي المعلومات الأساسية عن نشاطات الجمعي: Receiving basic information on the association's activities on a regular basis.
الاطلاع على المحاضر والمستندات المالية ف: View the minutes and financial documents at the association's headquarters.
دعوة الجمعية العمومية للانعقاد لاجتماع غ: Inviting the general assembly to convene for an extraordinary meeting in solidarity with 25% of the members who have the right to attend the general assembly.
للعضو أن يخاطب الجمعية بخطاب يصدر منه يو: The member may address the association with a letter issued by him to the board of directors, and the association may address the member with a letter issued by the board of directors or whoever the board delegates, delivered to the member in person, or sent to him through any of his addresses registered in the membership register.
الإنابة كتابةً لأحد الأعضاء لتمثيله في ح: Delegating in writing to one of the members to represent him in attending the General Assembly.
الترشح لعضوية مجلس الإدارة، وذلك بعد مدة: Candidacy for membership of the board of directors, after a period of no less than six months from the date of joining the association and paying the subscription.
للعضو العامل مخاطبة الجمعية عبر أي وسيلة: An active member may address the association through any available means, and the board of directors or whomever it authorizes must provide the answer through the same means or through his address registered in the membership register.
مرتبطة بالعمق التاريخي للمنطقة: related to the historical depth of the region
حضارة غنية ضاربة بجذورها في عمق التاريخ: A rich civilization with deep roots in history
تستمد طاقتها من قلب الحدث النابض بالنشاط: It draws its energy from the heart of the vibrant event
وتناغم كامل لمهمة وطنية خلاقة: And perfect harmony for a creative national mission
قرار تشكيل مجلس الإدارة: The decision to form the board of directors
إن وزير الموارد البشرية والتنمية الاجتما: The Minister of Human Resources and Social Development - Chairman of the Board of Directors of the National Center for the Development of the Non-Profit Sector; Based on the powers conferred upon him by law,
وبعد الاطلاع على نظام الجمعيات والمؤسسات: And after reviewing the Law of Associations and Civil Institutions issued by Royal Decree No. (M/8) dated 19/2/1437 AH, and after reviewing Article (thirteenth) of the Executive Regulations of the Law of Associations and Civil Institutions issued by Ministerial Resolution No. 73739 dated 11/6/1437 AH
And based on what was presented by the competent department.
أولاً: تسجيل (جمعية سفراء التراث) بمنطقة: First: Registration of (Heritage Ambassadors Association) in the Riyadh region and its headquarters in the city of Riyadh in the register of civil societies No. (2161) as of its date.
ثانياً: على الإدارة المختصة إتمام عمليتي: Second: The competent department must complete the registration and publication processes.
ثالثاً: يبلغ هذا القرار لمن يلزم لإنفاذه: Third: This decision shall be communicated to whomever is required to enforce it from the date of its issuance.
أشير إلى عقد اجتماع الجمعية العمومية الغ: It was referred to the holding of the Extraordinary General Assembly of the Society, which was held on Wednesday, 05/11/1443 AH. In which the resignation of the member Ahmed bin Abdullah Al-Mujahid was decided upon and the founding member Mohammed bin Abdulrahman Ahmed Al-Ghamdi replaced him, and then the council was re-formed under your leadership and the membership of each of the distinguished:
الدكتور/ علي بن ابراهيم حسين خواجي (نائب: Dr. Ali bin Ibrahim Hussain Khawaji (Vice President).
الاستاذ/ محمد بن عبدالرحمن احمد الغامدي: Mr. Mohammed bin Abdulrahman Ahmed Al-Ghamdi (Financial Supervisor)
الاستاذ/ مشهور بن مرزوق عياد العتيبي (عض: Mr. Mashhour bin Marzouq Ayyad Al-Otaibi (Member)
الاستاذ/ محمد بن هليل طنق الرويلي (عضو): Mr. Mohammed bin Hilil Tanq Al-Ruwaili (Member)
نفيدكم باعتماد هذا المجلس لدى الوزارة حت: We would like to inform you that this council has been approved by the Ministry until 13/03/1447 AH.
